description: This file defines a React component named ScheduleTabs which provides a tabbed UI for managing availability and scheduling ICU. It also includes a nested ManageAvailability component for configuring resource availability, including fetching resources via an API and handling user input for scheduling details.

methods.name: ScheduleTabs
methods.description: Main React component providing tabbed UI for managing schedules and availability.

methods.name: ManageAvailability
methods.description: Subcomponent for configuring and saving resource availability, including fetching resource list and user input handling.

methods.name: saveAvailability
methods.description: Handles form submission to save availability data, constructs payload, and provides user feedback.
